release.change: Eclipse 2022-03 Release
Bugfixes regarding Round-Trip-Engineering support for Java 17
Eclipse 2021-12 Release
Round-Trip-Engineering support for Java 17
Eclipse 2021-09 Release
Eclipse 2021-06 Release
Eclipse 2021-03 Release
Enabled license purchase within the Eclipse IDE
New User Account Management for editing your data
Eclipse 2020-12 Release
Eclipse 2020-09 Release
Eclipse 2020-06 Release
Eclipse 2020-03 Release
Eclipse 2019-12 Release
Introduced account-based licenses
Eclipse 2019-09 Release
Eclipse 2019-06 Release
Eclipse 2019-03 Release
Eclipse 2018-12 Release
Eclipse 2018-09 Release
Eclipse Photon Release
Eclipse Oxygen.3 Release
Eclipse Oxygen.2 Release
Improved UML Lab proxy support
Eclipse Oxygen.1 Release
Java 9 compatibility
Eclipse Oxygen Release
Eclipse Neon Release
UI: Fixed issue in Universal Tool.
Eclipse Mars SR2 Release
Architecture Review: Metrics to analyze Software Architecture
Architecture Review: Tooling to spot dependencies
Architecture Review: Visualize model-based call hierarchy
Architecture Review is now available on UML Lab Update Site
Diagram Editors: Fixed Snap to geometry option
Eclipse Mars SR1 Release
UI: Fixed issues with perspective customization
Eclipse Mars Release
UI: Added editing for attribute and operation multiplicities
UI: Improved floating license preference configuration
Image Export: Trim unnecessary whitespace on diagram export
Eclipse Luna SR2 Release
UI: One CellEditor for direct editing of Operations and Properties
UI: Added new filters for UML Lab Treeview
UI: Fixed routing of Containment-Associations
UI: Overhauled Appearance Property Section
Eclipse Luna SR1 Release
UI: Added possibility to configure visibility of default values
UI: Fixed deleting of Comments on Associations
UI: Fixed routing of Comments on Associations
API: Separated Diagram API - don't enforce dependency to Round-Trip-Engineering
Eclipse Luna Release
Stability and Performance Improvements
Round-Trip-Engineering: Added support for Xpand 2.x Templates
Licensing: Improved Proxy Support
Eclipse Kepler SR2 Release
UML Lab is ready for Java 8
UI: Improved link creation
UI: Added 'Configure Element Imports' dialog
UI: added support for UML Components
UI: Refactoring to replace occurrences
Round-Trip-Engineering: Support UNC paths
Round-Trip-Engineering: Support files with different line separators within a project
JPA templates: Improved support for EclipseLink
Team support: Prefer shared code details
Improved memory footprint for large projects
Eclipse Kepler SR1 Release
Eclipse Kepler Release
UI: Diagram Filter toolbar with new filter possibilities
UI: Several Universal Tool improvements
Round-Trip-Engineering: More agile round-trip feedback while typing
Round-Trip-Engineering: Improved memory performance
Licensing: Fixed issues with offline configuration changes
Licensing: Fixed blocking license dialog during startup
Eclipse Juno SR 2 Release
Model refactorings: Convert to/from PrimitiveType, DataType, Enumeration
Validation: Quickfix for broken Association
Validation: Check and quickfix for broken constructor declarations
Ecore support: Export DataTypes to EDataTypes
Ecore support: Fixes for base packages and classes in java(x).* namespace
Ecore support: New tutorial
Licensing: Fixed issues with the floating server
Ecore support: Create and edit Ecore models and generate EMF code
Support for model transformations with QVTo
UI: Navigation tentacles for packages
UI: Pimped "Show Neighbors" dialog: Use FQN, indicate direction of connections
UI: Indicate deletion of contained elements, when deleting elements in the tree view
Linking and Navigation: Use workspace relative pathes (fixes issues with Maven parent project)
JPA Templates: Support @Temporal Annotation
Round-Trip-Engineering: Improved reloading of code details with changed templates
Round-Trip-Engineering: Fixed issues with patches
Reverse Engineering: Fixed detection of legacy properties
Reverse Engineering: Speedup parsing and improved progress indication
Per-model configuration of code generation and reverse engineering
Licensing: Improved support for floating contingents
Closed a severe memory leak
Eclipse Juno SR 1 Release
Code Generator: If source code is not in sync, display a review dialog
Code Generator: Unified line endings to Windows
Eclipse Juno Release
UI: Re-design of "Hints" view
UI: Improvements for Mac OS (context menu and icons)
UI: Support hiding of Associations with a qualifier
Round-Trip-Engineering: Improved Java legacy support
General: Adaptions required for e4
UI: Distinguish between null and empty string for default values of Properties
UI: New diagram property tab simplifies configuring the root package
Java-Templates: Support JPA2 cascade type "Detach"
Round-Trip-Engineering: Improved start-up behavior with workspace profiles
Round-Trip-Engineering: Allow forcing of template reloading
Model Validation: Detect broken associations
Template editor: Highlight indentation
Template editor: Fixed selected positions when navigating from the model
Team support: Improved sharing of code details
General: Improved progress indication of background jobs
Eclipse Indigo SR2 Release
Round-Trip-Engineering: Control template reloading
Improved Mylyn integration
Maven integration
Mylyn integration: Task focused diagrams
Help: Added new hints to the UML Lab Hints view
UI: Fixed image export when diagram is moved beyond the origin
UI: Fixed incremental layout of Roles
Java-Templates: Support for Classifier nested in Enumerations
Eclipse Indigo SR1 Release
UI: Create new types within input fields
Core: Added "Getting Started" - tutorials
Core: Start-Up screen for UML Lab plug-in installations
Linux/Mac OS: Improved dialogs
UI: Display content assist icon on text fields with code completion
UI: Property section for StereotypeApplications
UI/OCL: Property section for constraint configuration
UI: Improved "Open Type" behavior in the configure class diagram dialog
Java-Templates: Round-Trip support for comma separated field declarations
PHP-Templates: Improved templates for MySQL
Support for Eclipse Indigo
UML Lab is ready for Java 7
Java-Templates: Support for Legacy Annotations in JPA Class Declarations
Java-Templates: Fixed some issues with JPA Templates
Core: Fixed memory leaks when closing models
PHP-Templates: Improved templates for the Zend PHP Framework
Round-Trip-Engineering: Improved support of (Java)-Imports
Round-Trip-Engineering: Consider input types when comparing source code
Round-Trip-Engineering: Improved support for automatic code pretty printing
PHP Templates: Support for the Zend PHP Framework
Java Templates: Improved support for collections
Java Templates: Generate code for Enums in standard code style
Round-Trip-Engineering: Inform user about actions taken when opening models
Reverse-Engineering: Ignore files with unsupported suffixes (eg .png, .jpg)
Team support: Preserve associated files across systems, keep checksums for up-to-date check
UI: Introduced more/less icons
RCP Upgrade to Eclipse 3.6.2
Solved deadlock issues
UI: Improved class diagram editor
UI: Fixed drag&drop support from the UML Lab tree
Code Generation: Improved support for post processing of files (e.g. pretty printing)
Round-Trip-Engineering: Fixed issues with source code refactorings
Basic Support for PHP including MySQL and CakePHP
Round-Trip-Engineering: Fixed issues with partial round-trip
Round-Trip-Engineering: Fixed issues with type hierarchies
Code Generation: Improved performance for large projects
UI: Improved performance of diagram operations
UI: Better handling of attribute default values
